answers.answer: HI,Yeast infection that is resistant to treatment of is recurring may be an indication of a systemic problem like low immunity, diabetes, chronic infections etc. Blood tests and vaginal smears and Pap smear should be done so that a targeted treatment can be given. Consult your gynaecologist. Hope this helps.Take care and good luck.

question: hi doctor ,I had yeast infection in June and doctor took a pap smear and told it would be ok after taking medications but am still suffering form itching even 3 months later also. Doctor has given me medications three times and nowadays I am on antibiotics but the itchiness doesn't go. Please help.
title: itchiness in vagina
